visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'column', chart title is 'No space reserved for X axis labels', axes and labels styling includes white color, 12pt font size, bold font weight, and 1px contrast text outline for labels, data series includes one series named 'Product Sales' with data [39.9, 71.5, 106.4], custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include disabling credits, disabling legend, and setting chart border width to 1.

title.text: No space reserved for X axis labels

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'No space reserved for X axis labels'. The X-axis labels are styled with a white color, 12pt font size, bold font weight, and a 1px contrast text outline. The labels are rotated -90 degrees, aligned to the left, and no space is reserved for them. The X-axis tick marks are hidden by setting the tickWidth to 0. The chart includes one data series named 'Product Sales' with data values [39.9, 71.5, 106.4], and data labels are enabled for this series. Additional configurations disable the credits and legend, and set the chart border width to 1.
